install.packages(tidyverse)
```{r}
trade_CNTS<-read.csv("trade_CNTS.csv",header=TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
summary(trade_CNTS)
trade_1970<-subset(trade_CNTS,Year==1970)
mean(trade_1970$Value)
trade_2018<-subset(trade_CNTS,Year==2018)
mean(trade_2018$Value)
```


```{r}
sum(trade_1970$Value)
sum(trade_2018$Value)
```


```{r}
var(trade_1970$Value)
var(trade_2018$Value)
var(trade_2018$Value)-var(trade_1970$Value)
```
```{r}
hist(trade_2018$Value)
hist(trade_1970$Value)
```
